verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me again, saying, <S%H559><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> mean you, that you use <S%H4911><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4911><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The fathers <S%H1><s%> have eaten <S%H398><s%> sour <S%H1155><s%> grapes, <S%H1154><s%> and the children's <S%H1121><s%> teeth <S%H8127><s%> are set on edge? <S%H6949><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> you shall not have occasion any more <S%H5750><s%> to use <S%H4911><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> proverb <S%H4911><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%> are mine; as the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the father, <S%H1><s%> so also the soul <S%H5315><s%> of the son <S%H1121><s%> is mine: the soul <S%H5315><s%> that sins, <S%H2398><s%> it shall die. <S%H4191><s%>
But if <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> be just, <S%H6662><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%>

And has not eaten <S%H398><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to a menstruous <S%H5079><s%> woman, <S%H802><s%>

And has not oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any, <S%H376><s%> but has restored <S%H7725><s%> to the debtor <S%H2326><s%> his pledge, <S%H2258><s%> has spoiled <S%H1497><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> by violence, <S%H1500><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry, <S%H7456><s%> and has covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment; <S%H899><s%>

He that has not given <S%H5414><s%> forth on usury, <S%H5392><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has taken <S%H3947><s%> any increase, <S%H8635><s%> that has withdrawn <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> has executed <S%H6213><s%> true <S%H571><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%> between <S%H996><s%> man <S%H376><s%> and man, <S%H376><s%>

Has walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and has kept <S%H8104><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> to deal <S%H6213><s%> truly; <S%H571><s%> he is just, <S%H6662><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

If he beget <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> that is a robber, <S%H6530><s%> a shedder <S%H8210><s%> of blood, <S%H1818><s%> and that does <S%H6213><s%> the like <S%H251><s%> to any one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things,

And that does <S%H6213><s%> not any <S%H3605><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> duties, but even <S%H1571><s%> has eaten <S%H398><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%>

Has oppressed <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy, <S%H34><s%> has spoiled <S%H1497><s%> by violence, <S%H1500><s%> has not restored <S%H7725><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> and has lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols, <S%H1544><s%> has committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination, <S%H8441><s%>

Has given <S%H5414><s%> forth on usury, <S%H5392><s%> and has taken <S%H3947><s%> increase: <S%H8635><s%> shall he then live? <S%H2425><s%> he shall not live: <S%H2421><s%> he has done <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> abominations; <S%H8441><s%> he shall surely die; <S%H4191><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on him.

Now, see, <S%H2009><s%> if he beget <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> that sees <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> sins <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has done, <S%H6213><s%> and considers, <S%H7200><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> not such <S%H2007><s%> like,

That has not eaten <S%H398><s%> on the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> has not defiled <S%H2930><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> has oppressed <S%H3238><s%> any, <S%H376><s%> has not withheld <S%H2254><s%> the pledge, <S%H2258><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> has spoiled by violence, <S%H1500><s%> but has given <S%H5414><s%> his bread <S%H3899><s%> to the hungry, <S%H7456><s%> and has covered <S%H3680><s%> the naked <S%H5903><s%> with a garment, <S%H899><s%>

That has taken <S%H7725><s%> off his hand <S%H3027><s%> from the poor, <S%H6041><s%> that has not received <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> nor increase, <S%H8635><s%> has executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> has walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes; <S%H2708><s%> he shall not die <S%H4191><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his father, <S%H1><s%> he shall surely live. <S%H2421><s%>

As for his father, <S%H1><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he cruelly <S%H6233><s%> oppressed, <S%H6231><s%> spoiled <S%H1497><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> by violence, <S%H1499><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> is not good <S%H2896><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> see, <S%H2009><s%> even he shall die <S%H4191><s%> in his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

Yet say <S%H559><s%> you, Why? <S%H4069><s%> does not the son <S%H1121><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father? <S%H1><s%> When the son <S%H1121><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> and has kept <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and has done <S%H6213><s%> them, he shall surely live. <S%H2421><s%>

The soul <S%H5315><s%> that sins, <S%H2398><s%> it shall die. <S%H4191><s%> The son <S%H1121><s%> shall not bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the father, <S%H1><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the father <S%H1><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the son: <S%H1121><s%> the righteousness <S%H6666><s%> of the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall be on him, and the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall be on him.

But if <S%H3588><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will turn <S%H7725><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> his sins <S%H2403><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> they shall not be mentioned <S%H2142><s%> to him: in his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> he shall live. <S%H2421><s%>

Have I any pleasure <S%H2654><s%> at all that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> should die? <S%H4194><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> and not that he should return <S%H7725><s%> from his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and live? <S%H2421><s%>

But when the righteous <S%H6662><s%> turns away from his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man does, <S%H6213><s%> shall he live? <S%H2425><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall not be mentioned: <S%H2142><s%> in his trespass <S%H4604><s%> that he has trespassed, <S%H4604><s%> and in his sin <S%H2403><s%> that he has sinned, <S%H2398><s%> in them shall he die. <S%H4191><s%>

Yet you say, <S%H559><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Is not my way <S%H1870><s%> equal? <S%H8505><s%> are not your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal? <S%H3808><s%>

When a righteous <S%H6662><s%> man turns away from his righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> and commits <S%H6213><s%> iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> and dies <S%H4191><s%> in them; for his iniquity <S%H5766><s%> that he has done <S%H6213><s%> shall he die. <S%H4191><s%>

Again, when the wicked <S%H7563><s%> man turns away from his wickedness <S%H7564><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> and does <S%H6213><s%> that which is lawful <S%H4941><s%> and right, <S%H6666><s%> he shall save <S%H2421><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>

Because he considers, <S%H7200><s%> and turns away from all <S%H3605><s%> his transgressions <S%H6588><s%> that he has committed, <S%H6213><s%> he shall surely live, <S%H2421><s%> he shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>

Yet said <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> The way <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD <S%H136><s%> is not equal. <S%H8505><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are not my ways <S%H1870><s%> equal? <S%H8505><s%> are not your ways <S%H1870><s%> unequal? <S%H3808><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according to his ways, <S%H1870><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%> Repent, <S%H7725><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves from all <S%H3605><s%> your transgressions; <S%H6588><s%> so iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall not be your ruin. <S%H4383><s%>

Cast <S%H7993><s%> away from you all <S%H3605><s%> your transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> whereby <S%H834><s%> you have transgressed; <S%H6586><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> you a new <S%H2319><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> and a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit: <S%H7307><s%> for why <S%H4100><s%> will you die, <S%H4191><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel? <S%H3478><s%>

For I have no <S%H3808><s%> pleasure <S%H2654><s%> in the death <S%H4194><s%> of him that dies, <S%H4191><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> why turn <S%H7725><s%> yourselves, and live <S%H2421><s%> you.
